means: 坚忍，坚持( persevere的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He is a persevering, approachable family man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个不屈不挠、平易近人的居家男人。

sentence.Network_en: They will only triumph by persevering in their struggle against natural calamities.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们只有坚持与自然灾害搏斗,才能取得胜利.
胜利属于不屈不挠的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... passionate 充满热情的 persevering 不屈不挠的 pessimistic 悲观的.
英文性格描述词汇 - Apple的日志 - 网易博客 ... 可靠的 reliable 坚忍的 persevering 细心的 scrupulous.
“有”字开头的成语_百度知道 ... 有害[ injurious;harmful;pernicious] 有恒[ persevering] 有奇[ bits and pieces;odds and ends].
A - 豆丁网 ... ,strict,severe 严厉的, 严格的 persevering a. 坚持的 ,a sex 性, 性别.

list.abs: perseveration theory 持续论perseverative error 固着误差perseverative set 固着心向
She persevered with her lessons ., 她孜孜不倦地学习.
perseverative error 固着误差perseverative set 固着心向persiflage 挖苦
Napoleon declared , " Victory belongs to the most persevering . ", 拿破仑宣称 , " 胜利属于坚持不懈的人 "

entry.def: If you persevere with something, you keep trying to do it and do not give up, even though it is difficult.

example.ex: ...his ability to persevere despite obstacles and setbacks.
example.tran: 他锲而不舍、百折不挠的劲头儿

example.ex: ...a school with a reputation for persevering with difficult and disruptive children...
example.tran: 因对捣乱难管的学生不离不弃而闻名的学校

means.word_mean: 1. quietly and steadily persevering especially in detail or exactness;

sentences.sentence: "with persevering (or patient) industry she revived the failing business"

auth_sentence.content: In his death geographical science loses one of its most persevering students.
auth_sentence.res_content: In his death geographical science loses one of its most persevering students.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In his death geographical science loses one of its most persevering students.

auth_sentence.content: The president read a Bible portion chosen for what it said about persevering through difficult challenges.
auth_sentence.res_content: The president read a Bible portion chosen for what it said about persevering through difficult challenges.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The president read a Bible portion chosen for what it said about persevering through difficult challenges.

sentences.cn: 胜利属于不屈不挠的人。

sentences.en: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
sentences.cn: 胜利属于最有毅力的人。
